title: 가정법+도치 ②
description: Were I to... 패턴. 예) Were I to win the award, I'd dedicate it to my team. 딱딱하지 않게 말하는 연습.
examples: Were I to win the award, I'd dedicate it to my team.
Were we to expand globally, we would need more resources.
Were they to accept our proposal, it would change everything.
learning_points: Were 도치를 사용한 미래 가정 표현

sentences.kr: 내가 그 상을 받는다면, 우리 팀에게 바치겠습니다.
sentences.en: Were I to win the award, I would dedicate it to my team.

sentences.kr: 우리가 전세계로 확장한다면, 더 많은 자원이 필요할 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were we to expand globally, we would need more resources.

sentences.kr: 그들이 우리 제안을 받아들인다면, 모든 것이 바뀜 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were they to accept our proposal, everything would change.

sentences.kr: 내가 다시 시도한다면, 다른 전략을 사용할 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were I to try again, I would use a different strategy.

sentences.kr: 우리가 그 기술을 도입한다면, 생산성이 크게 향상될 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were we to adopt that technology, productivity would improve significantly.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 우리 회사에 입사한다면, 팀에 큰 도움이 될 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were she to join our company, she would be a great asset to the team.

sentences.kr: 우리가 그 도시로 이사한다면, 생활비가 많이 들 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were we to move to that city, living costs would be much higher.

sentences.kr: 내가 다른 선택을 한다면, 결과가 더 나을 수도 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were I to make a different choice, the outcome might be better.
